channel.title: [EASY] Need help with updateing pk points! plzzzz
channel.description:
Hay all i need is a simple code that will refresh my pk point count. its inside my quest tab.
like so.
[code]c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Pk Points = "+c.pkingPoints, 7333);[/code]
so i need it to refresh in quest tab with out heaving to logout?

item.title: [EASY] Need help with updateing pk points! plzzzz
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

@eballer Why would you do that, when he can just use a update flag.

Read full topic

item.title: [EASY] Need help with updateing pk points! plzzzz
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“sex-scape owner, post:7, topic:414557”][quote author=eballer48 link=topic=516524.msg3749829#msg3749829 date=1315952807]

Hay all i need is a simple code that will refresh my pk point count. its inside my quest tab.

like so.

so i need it to refresh in quest tab with out heaving to logout?

add it in walking.java so everytime u walk it updates pkpoints
[/quote]

you know code for that? ;3 im in need of this aswell ;3[/quote]

Ill give you tips but no spoonfeeding.

Read full topic

What do you mean?

pk points = 1

if you get a kill it stays at 1 until you logout

i want it to change to
pk points = 2
as soon as he gets the kill
